divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside on the phone when i seen one red light in the sky Far up, I thought nothing of it until i seen another one following it. Then 6 more slowly followed it in the same path and disappeared one by one as they got far out!. I thought it was just a plane or something until i seen a lot more.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around March 15th 2013
